app.title: BISTEP Sensor Data Simulator
app.description: Generate and visualize synthetic time-series data.

results.comparisonAlt: Comparison of original vs. simulated data
results.trendCoefficientsTooltip: Coefficients of the polynomial trend line fitted to the data.
results.noiseStdTooltip: Standard deviation of the residual noise after removing trend and seasonality.
results.seasonalityStrengthTooltip: Relative strength of the seasonal component compared to the residual noise.

tooltips.trendMultiplier: Adjusts the magnitude of the long-term trend component. Values > 1.0 increase the trend's slope/impact.
tooltips.trendOffset: Adds a constant value to the entire dataset. Useful for shifting the baseline.
tooltips.seasonalityMultiplier: Amplifies (> 1.0) or dampens (< 1.0) the periodic patterns (daily/yearly).
tooltips.noiseMultiplier: Increases (> 1.0) or decreases (< 1.0) the random fluctuations (noise).
tooltips.trendCoefficients: Coefficients of the polynomial trend line fitted to the data.
tooltips.noiseStd: Standard deviation of the residual noise after removing trend and seasonality.
tooltips.seasonalityStrength: The difference between the maximum and minimum values of the seasonal component.
